name: BraummControl
0:
”Alexa,turn on the bedroom light”
”Alexa,turn off the bedroom light.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Braumm is the smart home solution that lets you live like Tony Stark, somewhat. With the Braumm Skill, you can voice control all your Braumm devices, including Braumm Wi-Fi Smart in-wall switches, indoor plugs, timers, and outdoor multi-sockets extension outlet. Simply enable the Braumm Skill in the Alexa App and link your Alexa and Braumm accounts to get started.

Power On/Off Integration:
Turn on/off your Braumm devices when you are either Home or Away by saying the following:
“Alexa, turn on the kitchen light.”
“Alexa, turn off the bedroom fan.”

Brightness Integration:
“Alexa, dim living room lights.”
“Alexa, set dining room lights to 70%.”

Color integration:
“Alexa, set bedroom light to blue.”

The Braumm Skill connects your Braumm Wi-Fi Smart in-wall switches, indoor plugs, timers, outdoor multi-sockets extension outlet, and all future Braumm products to your Echo Show, Echo Spot, Fire Tablets and Fire TV. It’s compatible with all generations of Fire TV, the second-generation Fire TV Stick, all Fire TV Edition Smart TVs and Fire Tablets Gen 7 and above.
